title: TechSolutions Annual Excellence Awards
description: Hosted the annual awards night for over 500 employees. The evening featured high-energy team engagement activities, awards distribution, and a DJ night. Managed the complete stage flow for a 4-hour duration.

title: Symbiosis Cultural Fest 'Vibe 2025'
description: Emceed the main stage for the inter-college dance and fashion show competitions. Kept the crowd of 2,000+ students energized for 6 hours with interactive crowd games and impromptu contests.

title: Leadership Summit & Team Bonding
description: Conducted a full-day team-building workshop for the senior management of GreenEnergy Corp. Focused on 'Communication through Rhythm' and 'Trust Building' exercises tailored for corporate leaders.

title: Royal Wedding Sangeet - Patil Family
description: Anchored the Grand Sangeet ceremony. Curated a personalized script revolving around the couple's journey and managed the sequence of 25+ family dance performances seamlessly.

title: Radio City 'Morning Masala' Live Launch
description: A special on-ground live broadcast event to launch the new morning show season. Interacted with listeners live on-air and on-ground, distributing merchandise and conducting quiz contests.
